revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Relic Passage |image = [[File:Relic Passage.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Relic Passage. |tokens = 156,500 |location = Unova Route D.R. }} '''Relic Passage''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Unova]]. It initially has 81 tiles arranged in an 9x9 square, including 9 chest tiles, 21 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 2,803,000 HP.
==Encounter Tables==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata || [[File:Scientist_(male).png|30px]] Scientist Terrance || [[File:Grimer.png|40px]] Grimer |- | [[File:Scientist_(female).png|30px]] Scientist Lumina || [[File:Venipede.png|40px]] Venipede, [[File:Koffing.png|40px]] Koffing |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Raticate.png|40px]] Raticate || [[File:Backpacker_(male).png|40px]] Backpacker Kendall || [[File:Herdier.png|40px]] Herdier |- | [[File:Backpacker_(female).png|40px]] Backpacker Eileen || [[File:Sandslash.png|40px]] Sandslash |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Roggenrola.png|40px]] Roggenrola || [[File:Hiker.png|40px]] Hiker Keith || [[File:Drilbur.png|40px]] Drilbur, [[File:Roggenrola.png|40px]] Roggenrola |- | [[File:Backpacker_(male).png|40px]] Backpacker Randall || [[File:Raticate.png|40px]] Raticate |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Woobat.png|40px]] Woobat || [[File:Hiker.png|30px]] Hiker Tobias || [[File:Roggenrola.png|40px]] Roggenrola, [[File:Timburr.png|40px]] Timburr |- | [[File:Psychic_(male).png|40px]] Psychic Tully || [[File:Swoobat.png|40px]] Swoobat |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Timburr.png|40px]] Timburr || [[File:Backpacker_(female).png|40px]] Backpacker Annie || [[File:Watchog.png|40px]] Watchog |- | [[File:Psychic_(female).png|40px]] Psychic Ena || [[File:Baltoy.png|40px]] Baltoy, [[File:Yamask.png|40px]] Yamask |}
